title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: The first successful experiment was carried out in 1759 by Mr WilliamDawson of Frogden, an eminent and enterprisingagriculturist, and with such spirit that he soon had100 acres under crop.
